title: Mobile-Based Entrepreneurship Competency Development Microlearning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Short-Term Microlearning Course for In-Service Professionals in Smartphone-Centric Limited-Tech Environments, Focused on Formative Assessment-Driven Competency Development

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose their general and professional competencies through an entrepreneurial competency assessment survey.
Learners complete over 80% of 3-minute microlearning modules designed to strengthen systems thinking competencies.
Learners create an entrepreneurial idea implementation plan based on peer feedback and achieve over 70% in peer evaluation scores.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
